title: 工业2实验版的电量怎么修改！【谢谢了】
author: 黑
txt_content: 风力动能怎么修改电量、核电站、太阳能

replies.author: Doby_
replies.txt_content:
config文件夹里有IC2的配置文件在那就可以改generator = 1.0

geothermal = 1.0

water = 1.0

solar = 1.0

wind = 1.0

nuclear = 1.0

semiFluidOil = 1.0

semiFluidFuel = 1.0

semiFluidBiomass = 1.0

semiFluidBioethanol = 1.0

semiFluidBiogas = 1.0

Stirling = 1.0

Kinetic = 1.0

1.0表示默认 2.0表示默认值的两倍

replies.author: 黑
replies.txt_content: 希望有一个人帮忙解决！谢谢了

replies.author: 黑
